attributes.action: GUARANTEE THE SOUND WELFARE OF ALL ANIMALS BEFORE SLAUGTHER.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition rallies the goverment to sit up and listen to the voice of the animals we use to eat.
Millions upon millions of animals are killed each year for humans to eat its about time proper policies, procedures and regulations are put in place, which are regulated and enforced fiercly.
Compassion, care and integrity should be shown towards these animals.
